title: Romantic Harbor
inscriptions: l.l. corner in oil: Leonid Berman/29; verso u.r. on stretcher on label: Wadsworth Athenaeum/Leonide/Henry Daniell Hitchcock/[illeg]; verso overall on stretcher in chalk and pencil: [various numbers]; verso c.r. stamped: Toiles & Couleurs-Fines/Paul Foinet Fils/21 Rue Brea Paris; verso l.r. in chalk: L B
